data.description:
Nokia is a global leader in connectivity for the AI era, advancing connectivity to secure a brighter world. The Automation & AI/ML Intern will assist in developing automation tools and applying machine learning techniques to enhance service delivery and solve business challenges.


Responsibilities

  • Assist in developing automation tools and software prototypes to enhance service delivery
  • Apply machine learning techniques to solve defined business challenges
  • Collaborate with experts to design innovative solutions for network planning and optimization
  • Explore new technologies using online learning platforms and internal resources
  • Document project outcomes and key technical learnings

Skills

  • Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree or Diploma in Computer Science, Electronics, Electrical Engineering, or a related field at an accredited school in the U.S
  • Familiarity with Python programming and basic software development practices
  • Knowledge of React, TypeScript, and JavaScript
  • Interest in machine learning, cloud technologies, and working with databases
  • Strong communication skills, curiosity, and a collaborative mindset
  • Exposure to LTE/5G telecommunications technology
  • Experience applying AI or automation to real-world challenges
  • Passion for innovation and continuous learning

Benefits

  • Flexible and hybrid working schemes to balance study, work, and life
  • Professional development events and networking opportunities
  • Well-being programs, including Personal Support Service 24/7 - a confidential support channel open to all Nokia employees and their families in challenging situations
  • Opportunities to join Nokia Employee Resource Groups (NERGs) and build connections across the organization
  • Employee Growth Solutions, mentorship programs, and coaching support for your career development
  • A learning environment that fosters both personal growth and professional development â€“ for your role and beyond

Company Overview

  • Nokia manufactures mobile devices, network infrastructure, and location-based technology for businesses. It is a sub-organization of Enscryb. It was founded in 1865, and is headquartered in Espoo, Southern Finland, FIN, with a workforce of 10001+ employees. Its website is http://www.nokia.com.
